thread.title: Fallsview offers wine package
thread.title_full: Fallsview offers wine package - Travel - The Buffalo News

author: buffalonews
title: Fallsview offers wine package
text:
• The Niagara Falls Marriott Fallsview Hotel & Spa in Ontario has a wine tasting package through Nov. 17. The Niagara Wine Escape Package deal includes deluxe accommodations, two VIP wine-tasting passes for Jackson-Triggs and Inniskillin wineries (value of $32); $40 (in Canadian dollars) dinner voucher for the Terrapin Grille; daily breakfast buffet ($32 value); in-house wine tasting; and free casino and hop-on-off shuttle passes ($13). Prices vary.
For example, in mid-September, the one-night package costs $170 for two, including taxes. Use promo code CUE. Info: (888) 501-8916, marriott.com.
• Wyndham Vacation Rentals has a last-minute deal with up to 50 percent off rental homes on several islands near Charleston, S.C.
The special applies to select properties on Kiawah Island, Folly Beach, Seabrook Island and Isle of Palms through July 11. Prices vary. For example, a five-bedroom home with a pool in Kiawah’s Vanderhorst Plantation costs $4,431 for the week, including taxes – a savings of nearly $4,400. Info: wyndhamvacationrentals.com, (800) 467-3529.
• Magdalena Grand Beach & Golf Resort, on the Caribbean island of Tobago, is offering 25 percent savings and two rounds of golf on stays of at least four nights. Rates vary.
For example, in late July, a four-night stay in a deluxe oceanfront room with breakfast starts at $1,079 per couple with taxes, a savings of $350. The free golf is worth $144 per couple. The Happiest Island deal is valid through Dec. 18. Book by Aug. 31. Info: (866) 353-6222, magdalenagrand.com.
• Holiday River Expeditions has a sale on Salmon River rafting trips in Idaho. For example, two July departures of the five-day Main Salmon River rafting trip are now $1,125 per person, including taxes – a savings of $250. The six-day itinerary in August and September is now $1,210 (also $250 off). For the Lower Salmon River Canyons trip, the kids’ rate is half-off the normal price of $895. Rate includes meals, rafting gear and guides; daily $5 Forest Service fee is additional. Info: (800) 624-6323, bikeraft.com.
Deals sell out and availability is not guaranteed. Some restrictions may apply.
